articles.title: Italy extends COVID vaccine mandate to everyone over 50 - Reuters
articles.description: Italy on Wednesday made COVID-19 vaccination mandatory for people from the age of 50, one of very few European countries to take a similar steps, in an attempt to ease pressure on its health service and reduce fatalities.
